title: having to wait an extra 20 minutes in queue because too many dodgers
body: it seems to be a curse that eveytime i happen to get low priority queue people seem to like dodging 5 times in a row to insure i get autofilled, which is not a problem nor my main point my point is that since the client update my client has be laggy even with low settings so eventually after  a while of people dodging my client cant keep up with whats going on anymore and freezes causing me to miss the ready up queue therefore making me wait an extra 20 minutes. its really fucked up. can someone help me on how to have my client lag less or something, ive been dealing with this for too damn long.
